thread.title: Neuwirth makes it 2 straight shutouts
thread.title_full: Neuwirth makes it 2 straight shutouts - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: Neuwirth makes it 2 straight shutouts
text:
Philadelphia
Michal Neuvirth stopped 30 shots in his second straight shutout, leading the Philadelphia Flyers to a 3-0 win over the Chicago Blackhawks on Wednesday night.
Sam Gagner , Claude Giroux and Matt Read scored in the Flyers' 12th straight regular-season home victory over Chicago. The Flyers have not lost to the Blackhawks in Philly during the regular season since Nov. 9, 1996.
Filling in for Steve Mason , Neuvirth posted his ninth career shutout. Mason missed a second straight game because of unspecified family reasons and there was no word when he would return.
Senators 7, Blue Jackets 3: Bobby Ryan and Mika Zibanejad each had a goal and two assists, Erik Karlsson added a career-high four assists, and Ottawa beat Columbus, which has lost its first four games in regulation for the first time in the franchise's 15-year history.
